name: Space Rocks 2
description:
Space Rocks 2 is a science fiction zen game set in an asteroid field located in deep space. Avoid colliding with menacing space rocks while collecting valuable gold coins.

Your ships are subject to inertial physics, and four rockets control your thrust vector. Curved space keeps danger in close proximity, so you have to stay on your toes.

This game is in beta testing phase. Some features are yet to be added. Feedback is welcome.
